hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE=$(cat | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path"); if [[ "$FILE" == */docs/*.md ]] || [[ "$FILE" == */docs/*.mdx ]]; then vale "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

hooks.prompt: Check if the edited file is a documentation file (ends with .md or .mdx in the docs/ directory). If so, review the NEW content for: 1) Spelling errors 2) Grammar issues 3) Passive voice 4) First-person pronouns (we, our, I). Only report issues if found. Input: $ARGUMENTS
